summary: A suspense thriller about a reporter from Miami who travels to Ecuador in pursuit of a serial killer known as the "Monster of Babahoyo."
cast: John Leguizamo|Damián Alcázar|Peki Andino|Amira Bustamante|Carlos Cedeño|Andrés Crespo|Elena Del Rocío Murillo|Susana Díaz Nieto|Jaime Estrada|Washington Garzón|Ricardo Paul Gonzalez|Patricia Higuera|Hugo Idrovo|Víctor Feratio Jiménez|Adrián Layana|Henry Layana|Walter Layana|Gloria Leiton|Camilo Luzuriaga|Joyce Macías Figueroa|Naidelín Macías Figueroa|Pablo Maldonado|Alfredo Martínez|Andrés Meza|Alfred Molina|Azucena Mora|Doris Muñiz|Támara Navas|Lic. Diego Oquendo|Rosa Alina Ortiz|Gabriel Paredes|Luiggi Pulla|José Adolfo Ramos|Manolo Sarmiento|Nancy Tamayo|Boris Valverde|Fabiola Villanueva|Leonor Watling|José María Yazpik|Raymundo Zambrano
title: Crónicas
